A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is a great movie! I recommend seeing it a second time because it can be a lot to take in\, and I enjoyed it a lot more the second time around. Everything that you need is in this movie\, great music\, great acting\, great effects practical and non practical\, callbacks to the originals\, Star Warsy humor\, impeccable action\, and a great plot!
